dcterms:description: A dataset containing subjects from the Alzheimer’s Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI) with multimodal imaging data including MRI, FDG-PET, DTI, AV45, and AV1451 scans, used for predicting longitudinal evolution in Alzheimer’s disease.
dcterms:title: TADPOLE Challenge

dcterms:description: A dataset containing MRI scans from patients diagnosed with Posterior Cortical Atrophy (PCA) sourced from the Dementia Research Centre (DRC), UK.
dcterms:title: Posterior Cortical Atrophy (PCA) dataset

dcterms:description: Synthetic dataset generated for testing the Disease Knowledge Transfer (DKT) model, simulating biomarker trajectories for PCA and AD.
dcterms:title: Synthetic PCA

dcterms:description: Synthetic dataset generated for testing the Disease Knowledge Transfer (DKT) model, simulating biomarker trajectories for Alzheimer's disease.
dcterms:title: Synthetic AD

dcterms:description: A dataset containing DTI scans from control subjects and patients diagnosed with Posterior Cortical Atrophy (PCA), used for validation of the DKT model.
dcterms:title: DTI scans from controls and PCA patients
